verbs.description: [ARG0: Roger Stone , a longtime Republican operative and ally of President Donald Trump ,] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] [ARG1: he is “ prepared ” to be indicted as part of special counsel Robert Mueller ’s investigation]
